title: Vegan Mini Cinnamon Rolls
directions: Preheat the oven to the temperature listed on the package instructions for the crescent rolls.
Roll out the crescent dough but do not pull apart. Instead, carefully pinch together the perforations to create one long sheet of dough.
Spread the vegan margarine evenly across the dough. Sprinkle with the sugar and cinnamon.
Carefully roll up the dough, creating a log shape. Pinch together any tears as you go.
Cut into 1/2-inch slices. Place theÂ slices in a muffin tin, giving each its own cup. Bake according to the package instructions.
Combine the soy milk, maple syrup, and powdered sugar in a small mixing bowl. Stir until smooth and no lumps remain.
Drizzle over the baked rolls and serve.
ingredients: 1 8-oz. pkg. vegan crescent rolls (try Pillsbury Original Crescents) 1 Tbsp. vegan margarine (try Earth Balance or Smart Balance brand) 1 Tbsp. granulated sugar 1 Tbsp. cinnamon 2 Tbsp. soy milk 1 tsp. maple syrup 1/2 cup powdered sugar
